abstract: Straw fedora is popular men's accessory at semiannual Pitti Uomo menswear trade show in Florence, Italy.
lead_paragraph: The straw fedora was seen everywhere at the big men’s wear trade show held twice annually in Florence.

headline.main: Surely Not the Last Straw at Pitti Uomo
headline.print_headline: Straw Poll Results Are in From Florence

snippet: The straw fedora was seen everywhere at the big men’s wear trade show held twice annually in Florence.
